title: Lust
description: 7 Wicked Sisters…Ashley is a good girl with a hot boyfriend—who has no idea his nerdy girlfriend has raunchy fantasies about the sexiest schoolgirls on campus. When she pledges Lambda Lamdba Pi, a notorious bisexual sorority, Ashley must bare more than her soul in order to join the sisterhood. It’s initiation night. Watch Ashley learn the price of:LUST!
author: Kitty Alba
